DOC.brief_summary: The role of vascular endothelial growth factor-C (VEGF-C) and its receptors induced lymphangiogenesis and host inflammatory responses on the carcinogenesis of oral cancers and premalignant lesions
DOC.brief_title: Expression of VEGF-C and VEGF-CR in Oral Cancers and Premalignant Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: The role of vascular endothelial growth factor-C (VEGF-C) and its receptors induced lymphangiogenesis and host inflammatory responses on the carcinogenesis of oral cancers and premalignant lesions
DOC.criteria: oral cancer and oral precancer specimens other diseases
